docs.lead_paragraph: As young, bearded Bill Powell rolls into his room in his electric wheelchair, his roommate, Crystal, quickly leaps into his lap. Mr. Powell is a quadriplegic. Crystal is a capuchin monkey.

headline.main: Health; ANIMALS THAT CARE FOR PEOPLE

docs.abstract: Patricia Curtis article on training of dogs and other animals to help handicapped people with daily tasks; illus; several owners comment (M)
docs.snippet: As young, bearded Bill Powell rolls into his room in his electric wheelchair, his roommate, Crystal, quickly leaps  into his lap. Mr. Powell is a quadriplegic. Crystal is a capuchin monkey.

docs.lead_paragraph: TRENTON IF EVERYTHING goes according to schedule, the Legislature will vote Thursday on a proposal to revise the abortion laws, thus plunging itself once more into a "moral" issue.

headline.main: Trenton Ponders Morality Issues; Legislature Is Pondering Morality Issues

docs.snippet: TRENTON IF EVERYTHING goes according to schedule, the Legislature will vote Thursday on a proposal to revise the abortion laws, thus  plunging itself once more into a "moral" issue.
